CustomField.defaultValue: "Instead of a traditional signature to confirm the information that you provided and your understanding of the overpayment notice and fraud notice, we have the capabilities of accepting your verbal acknowledgement. Do you confirm that you understand the overpayment notice and the fraud notice and that you agree to be bound by the accuracy of all of the information you provided regarding your Short Term Disability Claim?"
CustomField.label: Fraud Notice State STD Script
